Product: Shea Moisture Coconut and Hibiscus Curl and Shine Conditioner, 384 ml
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: The moisture after one use of the product is worth purchasing. I have long and very thick hair so this product actually really helped with the smoothness and richness of my hair. I do have to say my hair did get oily after two days so this may be the cause as it does have great oils in it. So if you are looking for something with natural products but may result in washing your hair alot more during the week then this is for you :)

Product: Shea Moisture Coconut and Hibiscus Curl and Shine Conditioner, 384 ml
Name: Abigail
Date: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2023
Review: I'm on my 2nd bottle of this conditioner. The bottle/pump are a bit annoying, as it pumps out the conditioner really slowly. I'm a dude with less-than-shoulder-length hair, and I have to pump it 30+ times just to get the right amount of conditioner.My first bottle, the pump got stuck when I was about 2/3 done the conditioner, and it's too thick to pour, so I had to cut the bottle open to not waste any. The 2nd bottle I just got today, the pump was stuck from the , so again I had to cut it open.I greatly recommend using this conditioner if you want luscious curls, but be prepared to struggle with actually accessing the conditioner inside the bottle.
